pain_points.problem_description: Long waiting times at transportation hubs due to manual ticketing systems.
pain_points.affected_audience: Commuters and travelers at bus and train stations.
example_quotes: I always find myself waiting in long lines at the station.
If only there were a faster way to buy tickets!

pain_points.problem_description: Difficulty in tracking the real-time location of public transport vehicles.
pain_points.affected_audience: Public transport users and city planners.
example_quotes: I wish I could see exactly where my bus is right now.
The lack of real-time tracking makes commuting frustrating.

pain_points.problem_description: Inefficient route planning for delivery logistics.
example_quotes: We waste so much time on inefficient routes!
An AI-driven routing tool would save us hours every day.

sentiment_analysis: Overall sentiment is negative due to frustrations with current systems.
